draft-comment.author: Kristen Eberlein
draft-comment.p: We have terms in this topic cluster that are not defined. Below are starting points for discussion:

dlentry.dd: The DITA map that is input for a processor.
The set of resources that are referenced by a root map and any submaps that it references.
The set of navigable resources that are generated by the topicref elements in the map tree that is generated from a root map.
A DITA map that is referenced by a topicref element with the value of the scope attribute set to "peer".
A link between two root maps.

conbody.draft-comment: Follow-up to the terms Kris suggested: -- Is a map tree the set of resources referenced by a root map - or by any map? That is, would "root map tree" and "map tree" always be equivalent?
